summary: Another entry into the Customizers. This comes with every option you can expect from a CC Customizer and more
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/9058/MGR3Xa.png[/img]

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b][i][url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]
[/i][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated!
[/i][/b][/color][/size]
[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Neve looks. You can change the body textures, face and eyes[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74655/?]Neve[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use Â TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\character\Wendigo[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\Wendigo[/color][/i]. The eyes goes into [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\Wendigo\Faceparts[/color][/i].[/size]
